about_the_game:
Expand Kaz's latest adventure!

This is Optional Paid Downloadable Content for Kaz's Adventure 2: Lost Souls.

Play through 8 new levels!

Adventure through 6 reimagined levels from "World 1" in Kaz's Adventure (2022.) and 2 new bonus levels using the original games level design process.

Reimagining!

6 of the 8 levels featured within the DLC have been reimagined from Kaz's Adventure (2022.), using Kaz's Adventure 2: Lost Souls (2024.) new level design elements such as slopes, one way platforms, enemy health bars, lighting and more!

Obtain new Pets and Survival settings!

Along with new levels this DLC also includes 4 new pets that instantly unlock upon opening the game and 3 new survival mode settings that will randomly get chosen once survival mode is unlocked.

Pets:

  • Classic Kaz Pet

  • Classic Zaz Pet

  • Classic Bob Pet

  • Classic Cloaked Pet

Survival Settings:

  • Wild Jungle - Survival Setting

  • Fields - Survival Setting

  • Stone Temple - Survival Setting
